column5: Heading into papineau on saturday, will have a boat. WE WANT TROUT! I got skunked in algonquin and I'm looking for redemption, I have my rod holder, a trolling rod and a line counter reel now (would dipsys work?), I don't care really what kind of trout it is (brookies would be nice). I've fished the lake for bass but never trout, I really have no clue what I'm doing so can someone give me an idea? Thanks.
Look up trolling for lake trout with 3 way swivels. I guess a dipsy would work, but they really aren't a lot of fun on fish under 10 pounds.
Water temps are the most important factor for finding Trout. Especially at this time of the year.
